text: Egh nɨ, gumazamizir Moses Osirizir Arazibar mɨgɨrɨgɨaba bagha uari adoziba, nɨ da baraghan markɨ. Gumazamizir adarir onganiba ko adoghodoziba bagha bar ifongeziba, ko uan ovavibar ziaba bagha uari adoziba, nɨ bar dagh itagh. E fo, akar kaba arazir aghuibar gɨn mangɨsɨ bar en akuraghan kogham.
